entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is hit by a spell cast by 'two', but still manages to point his wand at Malfoy and shout 'Rictusempra!'

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A character in the story who is targeted by Harry's spell. His name is mentioned as the target of Harry's wand.

entities.name: two
entities.description: The person who cast a spell that hit Harry so hard. The text does not provide more information about 'two'.

relationships.description: Harry's spell is directed at Malfoy, as mentioned in the text: 'Harry pointed his wand straight at Malfoy and shouted, ‘Rictusempra!’'
The person known as 'two' cast a spell that hit Harry so hard. This is mentioned in the text: 'his spell hit Harry so hard he felt as though he’d been hit over the head with a saucepan'.
